name: ansible-web-platform
description: 企业级Ansible Web管理平台 - 提供可视化界面管理Ansible playbooks、主机清单、任务调度等功能

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m flake8 app/ && python -m black --check app/
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Ansible Web Platform Team
